thread.section_title: FMW Fasteners Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FMW Fasteners | fmwfasteners.com
thread.title: Bern_S (Florida)

author: Bern_S (Florida)
title: Bern_S (Florida)
text: I needed a few specialty set screws that were not locally available, and FMW Fasteners had them and (this is important) had had them available by the piece at competitive prices. They got my order out to me quickly and the set screws I ordered were of good quality. FMW Fasteners is a great resource for when I just need a few specialty screws and not a bulk amount. Good prices, fast shipping, and a great product makes me a satisfied customer, I highly recommend them. Keep up the great work guys!
